title: 580. Steve Mariucci on Developing Quarterbacks
itunes:title: 580. Steve Mariucci on Developing Quarterbacks
description:
Bucky Brooks is back with a new episode. To start off, Bucky discusses Cardinals safety Budda Baker's contract extension and the value of the safety position (:23). Next, former NFL head coach and NFL Network's Steve Mariucci joins as he talks about developing QBs such as Brett Favre and current young QBs, coaching Steve Young and much more (7:14). To wrap up the show, Daniel Jeremiah and LaDainian Tomlinson interview Chargers WR Keenan Allen (31:18).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
